channel.title: 508 help
channel.description:
hello i need help with 508 coding.
i want to code a prayer alter in to edgeville between bank and wildy.
so far ive gotten the alter place there and i can see it and everything.
now i need to know where and a lil help with coding that when i click on it it reset prayer?
im trying to teach myself how to code so dont flame me please im a noob :)

If you want to know how to code in a language that you don’t know, you might as well learn the language. http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/index.html

That won’t teach him properly how to code 508s he will have to learn java yes. But then look at the codes and figure them out himself.

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

In objectoption1 put this anywhere.

case altarid: p.skillLvl[5] = p.getLevelForXP(5); p.frames.setSkillLvl(p, 5); p.rEquestAnim11(645,1); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You Have Restored Your Prayer Points."); break;

I coded an Anti-leech its really simple just bored if you can’t figure it out just post haha.
